summary: This mod enhances enchantments and enchantment crafting in the game. Allows you to craft all items that contain all weapon- and armor enchantments in the game from scratch! Disenchant them, to easily earn all enchantments. Adds a perk that allows you to add THREE enchantable effects to weapons and armor! And much, much more!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][color=#00ffff][b]This mod is also available for [u]Skyrim Special Edition[/u], which can be found [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/11878/?][u]here[/u][/url].[/b][/color][b]


[img=centre]https://i.imgur.com/tV4fk0w.jpg[/img]


What this mod does?[/b][/color]

This mod enhances enchanting in several ways:

1) It adds [i][u][b]enchanted amulets[/b][/u][/i] and [i][u][b]enchanted daggers[/b][/u][/i] to the crafting menu of the crafting-forge.

2) This which allows you to [i][u][b]craft[/b][/u][/i] the enchanted items the crafting-forge.

3) You can then [i][u][b]disenchant[/b][/u][/i] the item at enchanting station to learn the enchantments.

4) [b][i][u]Learn[/u][/i][/b] all the enchantments in the game without having to run all over Skyrim to do so!

5) Adds a new perk that allows you to [b][i][u]add three (3) enchantable effects[/u][/i][/b] to armor and weapons - instead of the normal 2.

6) Now you can [u][i][b]craft and disenchant[/b][/i][/u] Amulets of the Divines - which previously was not possible.

5) It allows you the[b][i][u] craft awesome utility items[/u][/i][/b] that will enhance enchanting and totally enhance your game experience!

THIS INCLUDES CRAFTING, DISENCHANTING & LEARNING [u]ALL ENCHANTABLE EFFECTS[/u] IN THE GAME THAT COULD BE PLACED ON ARMOR & WEAPONS!



This mod allows you to craft an [u][b][color=#ffff00]Amulet of Enchanting[/color][/b][/u] at the crafting forge, which when worn, boosts your enchantment ability and adds the [u][i][b]Extra Effects Enhanced perk[/b][/i][/u] to you whilst you wear it.

The [b]Extra Effects Enhanced perk[/b] allows you to add [u]THREE (3)[/u] enchantable effects to weapons and armor instead of the two. It is available at any level of enchanting and you do not need to be level 100 in the enchanting skill to unlock it – just wear the Amulet of Enchanting.

This is incredibly useful for new play-troughs, as it allows you to learn [i]All The Enchantable Effects[/i] without having to trample all over Skyrim from vendor to vendor, searching for the correct disenchantable magical item.

It also allows you to craft the[url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Amulets_of_the_Nine_Divines] Amulets of the Nine Divines[/url] that are normally not craftable or disenchantable (such as the Amulets of Mara, Stendarr, Talos, etc.) These can then be disenchanted at the enchanting station to learn the magical effects, which could then be added to armor.



[color=#ffff00][b]FILE VERSIONS:[/b][/color]

[color=#ffff00][u][b]Enchanced Skyrim Enchanting[/b][/u][/color]

This version contains the original mod file that enables all the crafting and disenchanting of all enchanted weapons and armors of the base game. It allows for the crafting of the Amulet of Enchanting, which boosts your enchantment ability with [u][b]100 points[/b][/u] and gives you the [b]Extra Effects Enhanced[/b] perk whilst you wear it, which allows you to add three enchantable effects to weapons and armor instead of the normal two effects.

It is available at any level of enchanting and you do not need to be level 100 in the enchanting skill to unlock it – just wear the Amulet of Enchanting.


[color=#ffff00][u][b]Enchanced Skyrim Enchanting - Balanced Version[/b][/u][/color]

This [b]Balanced[/b] version contains a mod file that enables all the crafting and disenchanting of all enchanted weapons and armors of the base game. It allows for the crafting of the Amulet of Enchanting, which boosts your enchantment ability with [u][b]15 points[/b][/u] and gives you the [b]Extra Effects Enhanced[/b] perk whilst you wear it, which allows you to add three enchantable effects to weapons and armor instead of the normal two effects.

It is available at any level of enchanting and you do not need to be level 100 in the enchanting skill to unlock it – just wear the Amulet of Enchanting.



[color=#ffff00][b]EXTRA EFFECT ENHANCED PERK[/b][/color]

The Extra Effect Enhanced Perk allows you to add three enchantments to armor or weapons, which will only be available when you are wearing the [b]Amulet of Enchanting.[/b] It is available from any level of enchanting.

The Extra Effect Enhanced Perk is an add-on perk for compatibility purposes, so that it doesn't interfere with other mods, nor does it replace the default Extra Effect perk.

However this mod has been scripted so that [b]default Extra Effect perk[/b] will overwrite the Extra Effect Enhanced Perk when unlocked – and only the default perk will apply.

Therefore, if you already have unlocked the default Extra Effect perk when you reached level 100 in the enchanting skill, you may enable the Extra Effect Enhanced Perk by selecting to make the Enchantment Skill Legendary and reapplying the perk points, without again selecting the default Extra
Effect perk.

The boosted enchantment stats will be more powerful than those added by the default perk points anyway, so you need not reinvest or select any of the enchantment perk effects, if you should so desire.


[color=#ffff00][u][b]Craftable Enchanted Items[/b][/u][/color]

The purpose of these craftable enchanted items is not for you to just create enchanted items to wear or use, but to create items to be disenchanted to learn their enchantment recipes, from which you will create FAR MORE POWERFUL enchantments on you favorite armors, weapon, amulets and rings.


After installing the mod, it will allow you to craft the following [color=#ffff00][b]Amulets of the Nine Divines[/b][/color] at the crafting forge under the [i][b]Jewellery[/b][/i] tab:

- Amulet of Akatosh--------------------(Increases Magicka Regeneration)
- Amulet of Arkay-----------------------(Increases Health)
- Amulet of Articulation----------------(Increases Speech)
- Amulet of Dibella----------------------(Increases Magicka)
- Amulet of Julianos--------------------(Increases Stamina)
- Amulet of Kynareth--------------------(Restoration Spells cost less.)
- Amulet of Mara------------------------(Gives you the option to marry an NPC.)
- Amulet of Stendarr--------------------(Shields Block more Damage.)
- Amulet of Talos------------------------(Time between shouts is reduced)
- Amulet of Zenithar--------------------(Prices are better)
 

Additional you will be able to craft the following [color=#ffff00][b]Enchanted Amulets[/b][/color] at the crafting forge under the [i][b]Jewellery[/b][/i] tab:

- Amulet of Health-----------------------(Fortify Health)
- Amulet of Health Regeneration-------(Fortify rate of Health Regeneration)
- Amulet of Fire Resist------------------(Resist fire damage)
- Amulet of Frost Resist-----------------(Resist frost damage)
- Amulet of Shock Resist----------------(Resist shock damage)
- Amulet of Magic Resist----------------(Resist magic damage)
- Amulet of Waterbreathing------------(Breathe underwater indefinitely)
- Amulet of One Handed----------------(Fortify one handed damage)
- Amulet of Two handed-----------------(Fortify two handed damage)
- Amulet of Blocking---------------------(Fortify block damage skill)
- Amulet of Smithing--------------------(Fortify smithing skill to improve weapons and armor)
- Amulet of Heavy Armor---------------(Fortify Heavy Armor skill)
- Amulet of Light Armor-----------------(Fortify Light Armor skill)
- Amulet of Sneaking--------------------(Fortify Sneaking skill)
- Amulet of Pickpocket------------------(Fortify Pickpocketing skill)
- Amulet of Lockpicking-----------------(Fortify Lockpicking skill)
- Amulet of Alchemy---------------------(Fortify Alchemy skill)
- Amulet of Haggling--------------------(Fortify haggling skill – get better prices from vendors)
- Amulet of Magicka---------------------(Fortify Magicka)
- Amulet of Stamina---------------------(Fortify Stamina)
- Amulet of Magicka Regeneration----(Fortify rate of Magicka Regeneration)
- Amulet of Stamina Regeneration----(Fortify rate of Stamina Regeneration)
- Amulet of Muffle-----------------------(Eliminates sound from movement – enhances sneaking)
- Amulet of Restoration-----------------(Fortify Restoration Magic Skill – spells cost lest to cast)
- Amulet of Illusion----------------------(Fortify Illusion Magic Skill – spells cost lest to cast)
- Amulet of Alteration-------------------(Fortify Alteration Magic Skill – spells cost lest to cast)
- Amulet of Destruction-----------------(Fortify Destruction Magic Skill – spells cost lest to cast)
- Amulet of Conjuration-----------------(Fortify Conjuration Magic Skill – spells cost lest to cast)
- Amulet of Enchanting------------------(Fortify Enchanting by 300 points – adds 3 enhancement perk)
- Amulet of Articulation-----------------(Persuade will almost always succeed & enhances speechcraft)

[i]This will allow you to learn all [u]armor enchantments[/u] in the game.[/i]


Additionally craft the following [color=#ffff00][b]Enchanted [/b][b]Daggers[/b][/color] at the crafting forge under the Iron Weapons tab:

- Dagger of Fire-------------------------(Adds Fire Damage enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Frost------------------------(Adds Frost Damage enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Shock-----------------------(Adds Shock Damage enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Magicka Absorb-----------(Adds Absorb Magicka Damage enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Health Absorbs------------(Adds Health Absorb Damage enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Stamina Absorb-----------(Adds Stamina Absorb Damage enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Fear-------------------------(Adds Fear enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Soul Trap-------------------(Adds Soul Trap enchantment to the weapon)
- Dagger of Turn Undead---------------(Adds Turn Undead enchantment to the weapon)

[i]This will allow you to learn all [/i][i][u]weapon enchantments[/u][/i][i] in the game.[/i]



[u][b] [color=#ffff00]ADDITIONAL ENCHANTMENT CRAFTING[/color][/b][/u]

This mod will allow you to optional craft the following useful enchanted items:

- Black Star------------------------------(Craft as many Black Star soul gems as you need)
- Skeleton Key---------------------------(Unbreakable lock-pick)

The Black Star and Skeleton Key is craftable under the MISC tab of the crafting forge.  When you are in jail – you get to retain the Skeleton Key (unbreakable lockpick) in you inventory.


[color=#ffff00]
[b]Compatibility[/b][/color]

This standalone mod adds new items, spells, crafting, enchanting, disenchanting and a perk to the game & should be compatible with most other mods.
